question: Which of the following states was the first to initiate Pool Testing to combat COVID-19?
explanation: Uttar Pradesh was the first state to initiate Pool Testing to combat COVID-19. Pool testing is a procedure where the testing is performed after mixing the samples of ten people. If the report is negative that means all are negative. In case any positive report comes out then the test will be done individually. This procedure will reduce the time and the cost of testing.
